text: Sokratis Skartsis (, born 1936) is a Greek poet and writer, as well as a professor in the University of Patras. He is also a founding member of the University of Patras Poetry Symposium. He has published 150 books, including poetry, literature studies, etc. ==Works== {| class="wikitable" ! Year !! Title !! Greek transliteration and English name !! Publisher !!
